m_szDocSumamry: New York To Promote Climate Smart Project New York To Promote Climate Smart Project Friday, April 29, 2016 This year’s New York State budget offered numerous headline grabbing changes, yet one of the less-heralded portions has the highest potential to reshape the state’s responsiveness to changing climactic conditions.  As part of the state transportation, economic development, and environmental conservation Article VII budget legislation (“TED Bill”), the Legislature passed Title 15 of Part U, creating a new climate change mitigation and adaptation account in the Environmental Protection Fund
